entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 5:20AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...ELEVATED SURF FROM POINT HOPE TO THE BERING STRAIT THROUGH MONDAY... North northwest winds 15 to 30 mph are expected today through Monday along the coast, south of Point Hope to the Bering Strait, causing elevated surf with minor beach erosion for north facing coastlines.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 1:18PM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Nye and southern Eureka Counties through 145 PM PDT... At 117 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 28 miles southwest of Pinto Summit, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. Locally moderate to heavy rainfall, which could lead to flooding.
